p: H6 AIVs were isolated from hunter-killed ducks during the hunting seasons of 2007 and 2010. Specifically, rosy-billed pochards ( Netta peposaca) in the Argentine wetlands were investigated and compared to prototypic H6 strains from North America and Eurasia. Of the five H6 isolates obtained, three were H6N2 subtypes and two H6N8 subtypes.
